resources.string: Some features can\'t be used without GPS
This app can\'t work without an internet connection
The value entered for \"Max. POIs\" is invalid.\nPlease, enter a number between 1 and 500
The value entered for \"Radius\" is invalid.\nPlease, enter a number between 0.1 and 10
The values entered for \"Max. POIs\" and \"Radius\" are invalid.\n\nPlease, enter a number between 1 and 500 for \"Max. POIs\", and between 0.1 and 10 for \"Radius\"

TripApp is a travel app that will make your sightseeing much more rewarding.

Thanks to the use of OpenStreetMap, TripApp offers multiple options to see what points of interest near your position there.

You can choose to view them in list format (Menu > POIs) or drawn on a map with your location (Menu > Map); as well as to access to the corresponding page Wikipedia or see a route point by point from your location to the specific POI.

The developers of this app are the "Cluster05":
 
· Rafael Matamoros Luque 
· Adrián Muñoz Rojo 
· David Carrancio Aguado
This app has been developed for the subject \"Mobile Systems\" of the degree in Computer Engineering of the University of Valladolid.
